answers.answer: I'd call your doctor. Pain and burning in the feet, even with out swelling, can be signs of certain issues.

Um, this would definitely be a reason to call your doctor!! It's possibly a sign of preeclampsia. But your blood circulation could also be in fault especially if you slept In only one position without moving your legs and feet, something like we call "my foot is asleep".

question: So ill be 36 weeks tomorrow and lastnight i woke up with my feet burning . When i got up this morning i didnt even wanna walk my feet arnt rlly swollen but whenever i walk i feel like my feet n legs are gettin tired of carrying all this weight i feel heavy . Before i got prego i was always barley over 100 pounds now im 148 . Is this normal ?
title: my feet !
